Package behaviours.example2

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ReceiveMessageBehaviour
    This behaviour is a one Shot.
    SendNbValuesBehaviour
    This behaviour allows the agent who possess it to send nb random int within [0-100[ to another agent whose local name is given in parameters There is not loop here in order to reduce the duration of the behaviour (an action() method is not preemptive) The loop is made by the behaviour itslef
    SumNbReceivedValuesBehaviour
    This behaviour receives nb integer values, sum them and then send the result back to the agent whose name is given in parameters In order to stay relatively simple for now, this behaviour is not fully generic (it is not declared as being part of a protocol) and do both the receiving and the sending processes.
